Request Access
Careers GET IN TOUCH

The Low-Code
App Platform for Industrial
Companies

JourneyApps makes it easy to build sophisticated enterprise apps for field workers in challenging environments, in industries such as Oil & Gas, Mining & Metals, Chemicals, Construction and High-Tech Manufacturing.

Not Just Another Low-Code App Platform

One size does not fit all.

JourneyApps is specifically designed to solve the really hard challenges that industrial companies uniquely face when it comes to building robust apps to connect their field workers.

By contrast, if you're using a generic low-code app platform, you will likely run into many challenges and limitations where you can't get it to do what you need.

Offline Data Sync? Solved.

We’ve spent 10 years building the best offline data sync on the planet — that you can start using within minutes.

  • Syncs fully relational data, with a universal data model.
  • Intelligent data partitioning — only sync what’s needed.
  • Encrypted on all devices, SOC 2 approved, GDPR compliant.
  • Handles degraded connectivity with no user impact.
  • Bandwidth-efficient and ultra-scalable, with configurable conflict resolution & continuous data integrity assurance.

All The Smart Hardware Integrations You Need.

JourneyApps comes with built-in support for NFC, RFID, reading data from Bluetooth sensor & measurement devices, scanning barcodes with laser scanners, printing documents to portable thermal printers, and integrating with IIoT platforms.

Move Mountains With The
All-in-One Industrial App Platform

JourneyApps is the only low-code app platform serving industrial companies’ unique needs — allowing you to build apps with a small development team that solve big challenges.

Web-Based IDE

Powerful web-based IDE & management interface with live co-editing and GitHub integration.

Learn more 

Cross-Platform Apps

Cross-platform apps on iOS, Android, Windows & web, with a single JavaScript codebase and a powerful UI feature set.

Learn more 

Scalable
Backend-as-a-Service

Highly scalable cloud backend with relational data storage and SSO integration.

Learn more 

Serverless
Compute Engine

Serverless compute engine for any-to-any integration, document automation and workflows.

Learn more 

Explore the Stack

Leading Companies
Trust JourneyApps

"We have this whole new world open to us where we can implement a digital, automated solution in a matter of weeks to help us achieve operational excellence."

Jodi Johnson, Director of Perfect Execution, Emerson

 Watch the Story

"What we are building with JourneyApps underpins our whole strategy in terms of service. It's transformational. It drives continuous improvement."

Craig Johnston, Head of Product Services, Rock Tools, Sandvik

 Watch the Story

"JourneyApps created refreshing simplicity and speed which made selecting them a very simple decision."

Laura Jacobs, Managing Principal, GE Healthcare Partners

 Watch the Story

“The ROI on our Site Survey application alone has been outstanding. We were able to take something that used to take 12 to 16 hours down to around 4 hours, and reduce our on-site time by 30%."

Pat Davis, Vice President, Global Services, Aviat Networks

 Watch the Story

See Our Customers

Turn Your Disconnected Workers Into
Connected Workers

JourneyApps allows you to build apps that ensure your workers are always connected to the data and workflows they need to execute jobs efficiently and safely — while providing excellent central operational visibility. We make it easy to move away from using paper, Excel and legacy systems to run your business.

Mining & Metals

Oil & Gas

Construction

See our customers Explore Industries

Secure, Reliable, Scalable and Integrated.
Peace of Mind Delivered
